author: johngog
content: So post 1559, It seems like some pools are always increasing block size, while other are always decreasing the block size. I'm not sure I understand each actors logic. Could some one point me in a direction for reading on the topic?

author: cf0009
content: 1559 was clearly not meant for a network at full capacity at all times. There's no one time spikes here, it's all spike

author: cf0009
content: L2's look great but they are not there yet and possibly won't be for months. We need more juice

author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content: There are a few trade-offs involved in raising the gas limit. Have a look at this for some insight: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vJNO_UqcH6A
